fields.name: Effect:
fields.value: Guess someone’s exact role, influenceable. If you are wrong, take 1 HP Unblockable damage. If you are correct, they will have their supposed role publicly revealed.

fields.name: Upgraded:
fields.value:
Guess someone’s exact TRUE role. If you are wrong, take 2 HP Unblockable damage. If you are correct, they will have their true role publicly revealed.

*This card in its normal form MAY be influenced by abilities and disguises. You cannot guess King. This card’s effect takes place at the end of the phase.*
